title: Twisted
description: Last piece to the puzzle of the saga between Sabrina Sloan, Blair Brown, and Tobin Peterson. Who is the father of Blair's baby, Zebulon? Is it Tobin or is it Lee? How does Sabrina feel now Blair is a part of her family? Who will win Tobin's love? Twisted takes you on the journey of love lost and redeemed. It answers a lot of the questions left from book two - Blair X. Come along for the ride as nothing is as it seems on this final and last installment of Church Chick and Blair X.
author: Michelle Carey
